channel.title: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!
channel.description:
[b]Commands:[/b] ::setting ::players ::home ::train ::outfit ::tween ::item
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rw9kULM.png[/img][/CENTER] [hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RD5Nh82.png[/img]
[B]What is Avarrocka you ask?[/B] Avarrocka can simply be defined as 'unique'. The concept surrounding Avarrocka is one of a kind and the design around it can simply be defined as 'amazing'. Our developers are a one of a kind breed, working endlessly to bring our playerbase the content they deserve and the stability to go along with it, as well as a uniquely designed client that allows the players to select many different features.
[HR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LizOR3S.png[/img]
Our management team is a professional team of people dedicated to help meet the needs of players by interactively communicating and answering questions as frequently as they come. Community managers enforce the rules globally and have zero tolerance for any hocuspocus that may be making it's way around. These members provide an enjoyable, interactive, friendy, welcoming community in which you will absolutely grow to love as you remain a loyal player to Avarrocka.
[HR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hsN9h07.png[/img]
We are consistently trying to improve Avarrocka to be the best and most uniquely modified and stable server in existance. Our philosophy here at Avarrocka is to always strive to be the best we can be, to interact with our community and not just be the team that helps lead our community to success, but also to be players and friends WITH our players and friends.
[CENTER]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/quJSZ1c.gif[/img] [url=http://avarrocka.net/][img]http://i.imgur.com/3z9C4De.png[/img][/url][url=http://avarrocka.net/forums/][img]http://i.imgur.com/oVbCCRg.png[/img][/url][url=http://avarrocka.net/game/][img]http://i.imgur.com/lNTi95Z.png[/img][/url][url=http://avarrocka.net/forums/showthread.php?tid=51][img]http://i.imgur.com/P9Bmdyx.png[/img][/url][url=http://avarrocka.net/forums/showthread.php?tid=50][img]http://i.imgur.com/K466oaX.png[/img][/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/18APGeE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ktixTa9.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cdBgPJl.png[/img]

item.source: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!

item.title: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:42, topic:541085”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=659954.msg4414075#msg4414075 date=1395001782]

So what’s with the animations… I guess you could say they are kind of smooth, but it’s awkwardly slow. Secondly when you click on an item you can’t wield that item slot in your inventory is stuck on highlighting until you try to equip something else. Then, on the 317 game frame the magic book tab shows the highlight icon for the backpack area over the 7th slot… It gets even better when you try to go into resizable mode on the client, but you’ve left the game frame on 317 and it stays at a black screen forever. I mean that’s within the first three minutes of messing around. I’m really not impressed with this at all.

I’ve said this many times and will say again. This beta had many bugs. Animations have Tweening you may disable that. 317 gameframe doesn’t have resize able mode. The item highlight is a known bug. I’ll try to fix that.

Are you even fixing the bugs…?

All bugs will be fixed in the official release. I did fix the tween object issue.

So actually finding bugs is useless because you’re scrapping the base you’re currently using to build one, or whatever you guys are doing.
I’ve only seen client sided bugs get fixed. Not a single server-sided.
The beta is useless if you’re not actually fixing up the current server…

I am actually. It’s not only fixing bugs. I have also to update data and content. Supply more unique updates. I’ve just fixed that semi-transparent item click bug.

What’s the point of beta then???

Gather a huge ass bug list to fix all the bugs for the official release…
[/quote]so you are keeping project2006scapeshit source ???

when do the lies stop[/quote]
Would you mind read my earlier reply on the subject of lies. I didn’t lied…

Read full topic

item.source: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!

item.title: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

When I started this project, it was me and Rob(Bubletan). We gathered many developers who quit afterwards for several reasons. “No working time” “motivation losses” “School” etc…

One of our developers was writing a framework(he quit for few months because of the army). He didn’t finished it. As the deadline was set, I had to fin the best ‘content-full’ & ‘non-PI’ server. So we came across 06Scape which was a pretty good appealing server. And after, I, myself took several weeks to fix bugs and clean it up. At the same time, we had to write several client systems abd perfect them.

This being said, the ‘shit-code’ isn’t present. We took the time to clean things up, document the process and format the code perfectly. There is still yet a lot to be done and that’s why I have another thread in thee development section. I’ll supply organized updates all weeks maybe even each days but no promises. Now I ask you to change the subject. You may continue the subject on the other thread. This is the server advertising and it has nothing to do with your current subjects.

Can you please tell what did I claimed ‘written be me’ and that wasn’t. The combat was written on a Hyperion base that we trashed for the 06Scape. I wasn’t claiming that I wrote a combat from scratch on 06Scape.

  • thank you.

EDIT: Bumpy

Read full topic
item.source: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!

item.title: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

@Vain_ I was told that one of the server developers was writing their own base from scratch (Rob). Is this true? I have no idea as I haven’t heard more regarding the matter since my last conversation with him.

Read full topic
item.source: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!

item.title: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

i wasn’t referring to ‘shitcode’ as a negative remark towards your programming ability, but rather rsps code.

i thought you claimed to have ‘perfect’ game frames - so what needs to be finished?

it’s just a question on whether you’re going to:

  1. lie and say you’re developing your own base and then end up showing off project2006 - then saying you’re going to make one later and this is just temp.
  2. actually make something worthwhile and improve your knowledge of the protocol/language.
  3. scratch this later and use another base.

nobody really cares whether you rip code or not. it’s only a problem when you claim it as your own/portray it as something you’ve worked hard on.

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:28, topic:541085”]how can you not answer my question? either you will be using shitcode, or you will write your own shitcode.
it’s a rather simple question.

also, how do you “finish” a client, without working on the server ? are they not working together, or are you going to hard-code data to populate client objects rather than streaming/reading the data properly ?[/quote]

Where does the negative information comes from? I said that I want to take time to finish the client. Finish gameframes, menus, hitmarks and properly implement the 602 data. Please read my Avarrocka IV development thread and ask your questions there.

Read full topic

also, how do you “finish” a client, without working on the server ? are they not working together, or are you going to hard-code data to populate client objects rather than streaming/reading the data properly ?

item.title: Avarrocka - Spawnable Beta - Awesome enjoyable content! - Online!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:26, topic:541085”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=659954.msg4413193#msg4413193 date=1394628222]
Yes, many things will have to be completely reworked. Sorry for all the bugs. I’ll fix them before Avarrocka IV. This is still beta
[/quote]the other guy claimed to be working on a new base - is this true; or do you plan to just “rework” project2006 [/quote]
I want to finish the client development once and for all. After, I’ll dedicate myself to the caerver development for several months and ensure that it won’t have any bugs. I can’t answer to your question yet.

Read full topic
